text: Soni tungasache tunganyyakwile (pa uchimbichimbi) ni gele (ma Ȃyago), nambo kuti jwalakwe jwapendechele ku duniya ni kuya isako yakwe, basi chilandanyo chakwe chili chisawu mbwa janti nkujikalipilamo jikasapumasika (pakutiila) mwakoposya lulimi, natamuno kujileka (ngajikalipila) jikasapumasikape mwakoposya lulimi, chele ni chilandanyo cha ŵandu aŵala ŵaakaaniile ma Ȃya Getu, basi siimbaani ngani kuti ŵanganyao achetelele
